description: A long-haired female in a lavender dress. Lekti has the ability to teleport herself and anyone she is touching at the same time, similar to Iolaus. She is curious about why the Golden Tribe gave their tribe such an unreasonable contract, and often visits Prome to discuss their fate. She shows a measure of affection and concern for Mehitaka, and is saddened whenever he must fight.
name: Lekti Leque
